name: workshop-manual-a11y-testing
description: A repo of exercises for the Testing Accessibility workshop: Manual Accessibility Testing & Tools

scripts.start: parcel index.html exercise1-keyboard exercise2-devtools exercise3-extensions exercise4-magnification exercise5-screenreader --no-source-maps
scripts.build: parcel build index.html exercise1-keyboard/index.html exercise2-devtools/index.html exercise3-extensions/index.html exercise4-magnification/index.html exercise5-screenreader/index.html --no-source-maps

author: Marcy Sutton
